name: Cubism (itch) (MegaSharkx1)
description:
This is Cubism. A game where your goal is to get Captain Sphere to the flag at the end of the level! Use multiple unique characters to help navigate the level and get Captain Sphere to the goal!

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 It fits into the theme "Stronger Together" as you need to use multiple characters working together to complete the level, and thus you are Stronger Together.

All controls explained within the game, but incase you need it here are the controls:

Arrow Keys or WASDee to control the camera!

"Left click" to move selected character

"Right click" to swap character

"R" to restart the level
